addr: 1006 South Olive Street Los Angeles, CA 90015
title: Cutting Workshop With Master Stylist Masahiro Kurosawa
desc: Studio DNA Salons in association with Eimi by Wella, Beauty Gives Back and the Well Los Angeles is proud to be hosting Masahrio Kurosawa, Master Stylist and Haircutter from Tokyo, Japan. ?Join us for a day learning his unique style of haircutting while discovering the hair industry in Japan and the overall culture of mastery. ?We are hosted by The Well Los Angeles that boasts an amazing event space, a cutting edge salon and a unique fashion experience. ?We couldn't be more proud of our partnership. Kurosawa has been doing hair for over 25 years. ?He currently owns five hair salons throughout Tokyo and the surrounding prefectures. ?His constant pursuit of mastery takes him around Japan teaching and exploring new technology. ?But his latest passion is developing handcrafte shears that are unique to the stylist. This workshop will explore it all, from his techniques, to the culture, to his passion about hair and his passion about shears. ?Everyone that has been in his presence has been honored by his generosity of knowledge and spirit. ? This it NOT TO BE MISSED! ?Everyone loved our first event -  . ?<<-- Click Here We will have several options to partcipate: Early Bird Observer: ? ? ? ?$75 ?(purchases prior to November 23rd) Early Bird Hands-On: ? ? ?$250 (purchases prior to November 23rd) ALMOST SOLD OUT Observer: ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? $95 ?(purchases after November 22nd) Hands-On: ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? $275 (purchases after November 22nd) Group Rates Available ?
